node.title: A ‘Bachelorette’ star says of her first marathon: It’s just about ‘putting yourself out there.’
node.alt: Tayshia Adams, a co-host and previous star of “The Bachelorette,” is running her first marathon.
node.description: Tayshia Adams will run the race with her fiancé Zac Clark, who she became engaged to on season 16 of the show.
node.content: ["Tayshia Adams, a co-host and previous star of \u201cThe Bachelorette,\u201d was among the runners waiting for the Staten Island Ferry to shuttle them to the starting line of the New York City Marathon.", "Adams is running her first marathon, and it turns out that starring in \u201cThe Bachelorette\u201d has helped prepare her for the marathon.", "\u201cMy nerves are at bay right now,\u201d Adams, 31, said. \u201cI\u2019m not too crazy nervous, and it\u2019s just about taking a leap of faith and putting yourself out there and hoping for good results.\u201d", "Adams will be joined in the race by her fianc\u00e9 Zac Clark, 37, who she became engaged to on season 16 of the show. Clark is running the race for the seventh time."]
